Title: Establishes a moratorium on the use of forensic child custody evaluators in family court proceedings
Summary: Establishes a moratorium on the use of forensic child custody evaluators in family court proceedings by the office of court administration.
LawCode: Amd §§70 & 240, Dom Rel L; amd §651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to establishing a moratorium on the use of forensic child custody evaluators in family court proceedings
